posts.post_content:
Card is now in a PSA 5 holder.  

Not a big fan of rarities -  hoping to take advantage of T206 craze and get a nice premium that would allow me to pick up other PSA 5 HOFs I need. 

If interest please ping me with best offer.  

Best,

Brian

[url]brian.collie@booz.com[/url]
Can you post a scan F/B of it graded?

Out of town today but will do when I get back home - likely tomorrow.

Just got caught up with the T206 freak thread and decided to post while on the road - unfortunately, this was all I had on my computer.

Thanks

Sorry for the delay.  Here are the scans.  The back of the Cobb is not nearly as discolored as being made out by this one scan.  

Email with offers.  Thanks,

[url]brian.collie@booz.com[/url]

Brian
Yes, beautiful card!  I am embarrassed to think what I'd offer for that card if I had the money at my disposal.
Just look how perfect the centering on the back is :-)
